Package DAO

Class AppointmentDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.AppointmentDAOImpl
  • public class AppointmentDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the DAO model for the appointment functions.

        Inserts a new appointment into the database.
        Parameters:
        id - Appointment ID
        title - Appointment Title
        description - Appointment Description
        location - Appointment Location
        type - Appointment Type
        start - Start date and time
        end - End date and time
        createDate - Date created
        createdBy - User who created appointment
        lastUpdate - Date last updated
        lastUpdatedBy - User who last updated appointment
        customerId - Customer ID
        userId - User ID
        contactId - Contact ID

      • apptQuantity

        public static java.lang.Number apptQuantity​(java.lang.String month,
                                            java.lang.String type)
        Counts the quantity of appointments in a selected month. Contains a lambda expression to convert a month string to the corresponding integer value.
        Parameters:
        month - Selected month
        type - Appointment type
        Returns:
        countAppts integer of the total quantity of appointments

      • getLongAppointments

        public static java.lang.Number getLongAppointments()
        Get the quantity of appointments with length greater than 1 hour.
        Returns:
        countLongAppts Integer representing quantity of appointments >1 hour.
